name: RunButNotBeDead: In Search Of Tea
description:
Hello there

This game is a Fast-Paced 3D-Platformer with some other mechanics.

This is also my first game, so don't be too prejudiced, because I'm not good at making games.

This is now an Alpha version. Over time, the content will be added, and bugs I will try to fix.

Game Controls :

- WASD - move

- Space - jump

- Ctrl - slide

- Left mouce button - shoot

- E - pick up objects

- When you are falling on the Red JumpPad, you can down button Space to jump higher

♡Have Fun♡
